Hi there,Â I'm not a therapist and can only offer some possible reasons for your tears.  Crying is a natural response to many things that are going on in our lives such as overwhelming emotions or simply being stressed out. It could be stress at work, school, home life, relationship changes, the holidays...it might also be an underlying issue you haven't addressed yet. Try talking with someone close friends, family member about what's going on and see if they have any ideas. If this doesn't help consider getting professional counseling.
